Shopping online just got smarter with PriceHawk, your personal price tracker! Tired of missing out on deals and discounts? Fret not; we've got you covered. PriceHawk is your ultimate price tracking companion! 

The extension is designed to address a common challenge faced by online shoppers: the difficulty of staying up-to-date with fluctuating prices and potential savings on their desired products. Our goal with the PriceHawk project is to provide users with a powerful tool that empowers them to track and monitor the prices of items across various e-commerce platforms, enabling them to make informed purchasing decisions and maximize their savings.

Core features:

Price tracking: with PriceHawk, you can effortlessly monitor prices for items across various online stores. Simply click on the price element, and we'll do the rest. No more manually checking for price drops!

Real-Time Updates: We keep a watchful eye on your tracked items. As soon as there's a price drop or a discount, PriceHawk sends you instant notifications. You'll never miss a great deal again.

Personalized Alerts: Customize your alerts to suit your preferences. Whether it's electronics, fashion, or household goods, you can tailor the notifications and tracking information via the dashboard to match your interests.

Price History Charts: Make informed purchase decisions with historical price charts. Understand price trends over time and shop with confidence.

Detailed Dashboard: Gain a comprehensive overview of all your tracked items, search and organize with ease, create item groups for efficient management, and even set dynamic rules for tailored tracking.
